00010 #include "itpp/itmex.h"
00011 #include "SISO.h"

00013 using namespace itpp;
00014 
00015 void mexFunction(int n_output, mxArray *output[], int n_input, const mxArray *input[])
00016 {
00017     // Check the number of inputs and output arguments
00018     if(n_output!=1) mexErrMsgTxt("One output required!");
00019     if(n_input!=5) mexErrMsgTxt("Five inputs required!");
00020     
00021     // Convert input variables to IT++ format
00022     vec rec_sig = mxArray2vec(input[0]);
00023     vec apriori_data = mxArray2vec(input[1]);
00024     vec ch_imp_response = mxArray2vec(input[2]);
00025     bvec prec_gen = mxArray2bvec(input[3]);
00026     double sigma2 = mxArray2double(input[4]);
00027     
00028     // ------------------ Start of routine ---------------------------
00029     tr::SISO siso;
00030     siso.set_precoder_generator(prec_gen);    
00031     siso.set_impulse_response(ch_imp_response);
00032     siso.set_noise(sigma2);
00033     siso.set_map_metric("logMAP");
00034     siso.set_tail(false);
00035     vec extrinsic_data;
00036     siso.equalizer(extrinsic_data, rec_sig, apriori_data);
00037     // ------------------ End of routine -----------------------------
00038     
00039     // Convert the IT++ format to Matlab format for output
00040     output[0] = mxCreateDoubleMatrix(1, extrinsic_data.length(), mxREAL);
00041     vec2mxArray(extrinsic_data, output[0]);
00042 }
